How can I get information about the blockchain using the Verus command line?
You can get information about the blockchain by running the command `verus getblockchaininfo`.

Examples:
> verus getblockchaininfo 
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getblockchaininfo", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
